mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT/*INDEX_DESC(PRODUCT PRODUCT_PK) */ ROWNUM RN , P.PRODUCT_CODE , P.PRODUCT_NAME , P.PRODUCT_BRAND , P.PRODUCT_PRICE , P.PRODUCT_TYPE , P.PRODUCT_IMGPATH , P.PRODUCT_IMG , P.PRODUCT_THUMBNAIL , P.PRODUCT_CONTENT , P.PRODUCT_REGDATE FROM PRODUCT P WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) WHERE RN > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT/*INDEX_DESC(BOARD_ASK BOARD_ASK_PK) */ ROWNUM RN, BOARD_ASK_NUMBER, BOARD_ASK_MEMBER_ID, BOARD_ASK_DATE, BOARD_ASK_TITLE, BOARD_ASK_CONTENT, BOARD_ASK_STATE, BOARD_ASK_TYPE FROM BOARD_ASK WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) WHERE RN > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT/*INDEX_DESC(BOARD_REVIEW BOARD_REVIEW_PK)*/ ROWNUM RN, R.BOARD_REVIEW_NUMBER, R.BOARD_REVIEW_MEMBER_ID, P.PRODUCT_NAME, R.BOARD_REVIEW_SCORE, R.BOARD_REVIEW_DATE, R.BOARD_REVIEW_CONTENT, R.BOARD_REVIEW_IMG, R.BOARD_REVIEW_IMGPATH, R.BOARD_REVIEW_THUMBNAIL FROM PRODUCT P, BOARD_REVIEW R WHERE R.BOARD_REVIEW_PRODUCT_CODE = P.PRODUCT_CODE AND ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) WHERE RN > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT/*INDEX_ASC(MEMBER MEMBER_PK)*/ ROWNUM RN, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_TEL, M.MEMBER_REGDATE, A.AUTHORITIES_MEMBER, A.AUTHORITIES_MANAGER, A.AUTHORITIES_ADMIN FROM MEMBER M, AUTHORITIES A WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = A.AUTHORITIES_MEMBER_ID AND ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) WHERE RN > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
SELECT * FROM PRODUCT, STOCK WHERE PRODUCT.PRODUCT_CODE = STOCK.STOCK_PRODUCT_CODE AND PRODUCT.PRODUCT_CODE = #{productCode}

SELECT M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_EMAIL, M.MEMBER_TEL, M.MEMBER_REGDATE, M.MEMBER_ADDRESS, M.MEMBER_ADDRESS_POSTCODE, M.MEMBER_ADDRESS_MEMBER, A.AUTHORITIES_MEMBER, A.AUTHORITIES_MANAGER, A.AUTHORITIES_ADMIN FROM MEMBER M, AUTHORITIES A WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = A.AUTHORITIES_MEMBER_ID AND M.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
